ca.mcgill.ecse211.model

Class AssessCanColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.model.AssessCanColor

  • public class AssessCanColor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows the robot to correctly identify a can's color by taking the mode of many samples.
    Author:
    Carlo D'Angelo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ColorClassification csFront 
      private EV3LargeRegulatedMotor csMotor 
      private static int ROTATE_AMOUNT
      Amount (in degrees) that the color sensor travels around the can for every color classification sample.
      private static int ROTATE_COUNT
      Amount of color classification samples that the color sensor takes.
      private static int ROTATION_SPEED
      Speed (in degrees/second) that the sensor travels around the can.
      private static int TURN_ERROR
